topHeadline: Trump Administration to Stop Measuring Food Insecurity
snippet: The move strips the government of its main gauge of hunger in America, and will impede efforts to track the impact of aid cuts.
lead: The move strips the government of its main gauge of hunger in America, and will impede efforts to track the impact of aid cuts.

events.title: Trump Administration to Stop Measuring Food Insecurity
events.summary: The move strips the government of its main gauge of hunger in America, and will impede efforts to track the impact of aid cuts.

events.title: Pentagon places further restrictions on journalists' access
events.summary: Journalists who cover the Defense Department at the Pentagon can no longer gather or report information, even if it is unclassified, unless it’s been authorized for release by the government, defense…

events.title: Trump publicly pushes Attorney General Pam Bondi to prosecute his political foes
events.summary: President Donald Trump exerted public pressure Saturday night on Attorney General Pam Bondi, saying it was time for the Justice Department to take action against a number of his political foes

topHeadline: The H-1B Visa: Why Is Trump Adding a $100,000 Fee?
snippet: President Trump signed a proclamation on Friday adding a $100,000 fee to visas for skilled foreign workers. Immigration hard-liners have criticized the program…
lead: President Trump signed a proclamation on Friday adding a $100,000 fee to visas for skilled foreign workers. Immigration hard-liners have criticized the program for replacing American workers.

events.title: The H-1B Visa: Why Is Trump Adding a $100,000 Fee?
events.summary: President Trump signed a proclamation on Friday adding a $100,000 fee to visas for skilled foreign workers. Immigration hard-liners have criticized the program for replacing American workers.

events.title: Charlie Kirk honored by Trump & Republican leaders at memorial service
events.summary: President Trump joined thousands of supporters at State Farm Stadium in Arizona to honor the life and legacy of conservative activist Charlie Kirk nearly two weeks after he was assassinated. NBC News…

events.title: Trump and Musk Are Seen Together at Kirk Memorial, Months After Falling-Out
events.summary: The meeting came just three months after Mr. Musk exited the government in a fit of rage, attacking the president on social media.
